name: Roasted Garlic and Herb Nuts
description: Delight in the savory blend of roasted garlic and fragrant herbs with Roasted Garlic and Herb Nuts. These crunchy nuts offer a satisfying snacking experience with their bold and savory flavors.

name: Smoky Bacon and Cheddar Popcorn
description: Indulge in the classic combination of smoky bacon and sharp cheddar with Smoky Bacon and Cheddar Popcorn. Each kernel is coated in a savory blend, offering a delightful burst of flavor in every bite.

name: Spicy Chili Lime Corn Nuts
description: Awaken your taste buds with Spicy Chili Lime Corn Nuts. These crunchy and zesty snacks feature roasted corn nuts seasoned with a blend of spicy chili and tangy lime, creating a savory and invigorating snacking experience.
